Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): xorg-x11-server-common-1.19.1-1.fc25.x86_64 xorg-x11-drv-intel-2.99.917-26.20160929.fc25.x86_64
How reproducible:
Steps to Reproduce: 1. 2. 3.
Actual results:
Expected results:

[114614.768] (EE) Fatal server error: [114614.768] (EE) AddScreen/ScreenInit failed for driver 0
lspci -v | grep VGA 00:02.0 VGA compatible controller: Intel Corporation HD Graphics P530 (rev 06) (prog-if 00 [VGA controller])

filed a separate bug on modesetting failure :
https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1413318

This change makes some resolutions unavailable on my laptop with a 1920x1080 panel and Intel HD 4400.
After the upgrade all 16:9 resolutions (a part from 1920x1080) disappeared, like 1600x900 that sometime I use.
Downgrading to 1.19.0-0.3.20161026.fc25.x86_64 everything is working as expected.
